full_text:
Incident Report
J6-6702
CHERokee COUNTY SHERIFF'S OFFICE
CALLER/COMPLAINANT 2: SANDBERG,DAWN
CALLER/COMPLAINANT 2 Individual
Race Sex DOB Age Juvenile
WHITE FEMALE 03/17/1969 36 No
Address Type
HOME
CANTON
City State
CANTON GEORGIA
SOCIAL SECURITY NUMBER
Home Phone
HOME (678) 880-2746
JUVENILE 1: Confidential
Race Sex DOB
JUV 1 No See Confidential Page
Narrative
While on patrol, I was dispatched to a missing person call at
and made contact with the caller/mother of the missing juvenile female. She stated her juvenile daughter left yesterday for school, and had not returned.
told me she had spoken with her daughter around 1900 and she was going to the high school basketball game. Later on that night, some of the juveniles's friends called the mother and informed her they had not seen the juvenile at the game.
When the juvenile didn't return this morning,
said she became worried and started to contact some of her daughter's friends. They told her they heard she was hanging hanging around with Mr. Byron Elrod in an area known as "The Cut" which is located off Old Donaldson and Highway 140. "The Cut" is a known drug area in the county. I completed a missing person's checklist and obtained a recent picture of the juvenile. I called Detective Allen and informed her of the situation. The mother did not want a juvenile complaint filed. I issued a case card and asked her to call if she found any more information regarding her daughter. D/S Ballard and I left the residence and returned to service.
After patrolling Old Donaldson Rd and the Crissler Street area, we were unable to locate any additional information as to the whereabouts of the female. Around 1200, I received a telephone call from
stating that she had found her daughter, and she was located at Gregory Lane Apartments off Bells Ferry Rd. The mother told me a friend of the family was going to pick the female up, and escort her back to the parents house. I told
to call 911 when her daughter returned and a deputy would be sent out to check on the well being of the juvenile.
When the juvenile returned Sgt Thompson met with the juvenile and parents at the house. The Juvenile stated she had been drinking and had done some drugs last night, and that she had been scared to call her parents. She then went to a friends house located at Gregory Lane Apartments and spent the night.
Report Officer
000025/BRYANT, CHRISTOPHER
Printed At
06/06/2006 11:12
Page 2 of 3
07/26/17 Page 51 of 95 Public Records Request No.: 17-295 DOJ-OGR-00032241

additional_notes: The document appears to be a scanned incident report from the Cherokee County Sheriff's Office. The report is partially redacted, with some information blacked out. The narrative section describes a missing person case involving a juvenile female. The document is page 2 of 3 and is part of a larger public records request.
